title: Pixel x Play Points Promotion Offer Suspended
content:
Hey Pixel Community,

We have suspended redemption of the Pixel x Play Points promotional offer. We are actively working to fix the issue. Additional details are shared below.

The promotional period was slated to run from Oct. 8, 2020 through April 30th, 2021. Customers who purchase and activate a Pixel 4a (5G) or a Pixel 5 by April 30, 2021 in the United States, Germany, France, United Kingdom, Australia, or Taiwan during the promotional period may be eligible to receive Google Play Points. 

Unfortunately, after detecting technical issues, we have suspended redemption of this offer.  
We are working to fix the issue. If you have any questions, please contact the Play Support team.

Thanks for your patience and support,

Google Pixel Support Team
